name: Reincarnation
desc: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Borrowed Time
desc:
When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

name: Surge
desc: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of maximum movement speed.

name: Exorcism
desc: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.  Lasts 35 seconds.

name: Eye of the Storm
desc: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Decay
desc: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Void
desc: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage.  Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities. The slowing effect lasts longer at night. Deals half damage during day.

name: Corrosive Skin
desc: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a 1400 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.

name: Rocket Barrage
desc: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3 seconds.

name: Rot
desc: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
